Layer.InitCommand:
%function(self) self:stretchto(0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH,SCREEN_HEIGHT) self:diffuse(ColorRGB(0)) self:diffusealpha(0.5)
if OatProfile().OATBackgroundShader == 2 then self:hidden(0) else self:hidden(1) end self:effectclock('timer') end
Layer.UpdateBackgroundShaderMessageCommand: %function(self) if OatProfile().OATBackgroundShader == 2 then self:hidden(0) else self:hidden(1) end end
